alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 11:59AM EDT until July 10 at 10:28PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hoosic River At Williamstown. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 10 feet, Water covers the lowest portions of Cole Field. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EDT Monday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 6.3 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 9 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.7 feet on 04/23/1969. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hoosic River Williamstown Flood Stage: 9.0 Observed Stage at Mon 11 am: 9.7 Forecast: Mon 2 pm 9.7 Mon 8 pm 8.0 Tue 2 am 7.6 Tue 8 am 7.3 Tue 2 pm 7.0 Tue 8 pm 6.8 Wed 2 am 6.6 Wed 8 am 6.5 Wed 2 pm 6.5 Wed 8 pm 6.4 Thu 2 am 6.4 Thu 8 am 6.3 &&
